div.span: You may already have an idea how you would like your solar panels installed. You can upload a photo at the end of this questionnaire for clarification. Don't have a photo? Then you can give a brief description in the field below.

div.label: Where do you want to mount your solar panels?

div.span: The quote that you have received from us will state the dimensions of your inverter. There must be a natural ventilation of about 50 cm around this inverter. We will always try to place the inverter as close as possible to the panels. However, other places are also possible in consultation.

It is important that the inverter comes to hang on a sturdy wall, with cables attached to the bottom. A few cables come from the solar panels to the inverter; the so-called DC (direct voltage) cabling. In addition, a cable with approximately the thickness of an inch will come to the meter box: the so-called AC (alternating voltage) cabling.
